summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 2, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 1, being the alley between 11th Avenue North and 12th Avenue North, from East Roy Street to East Aloha Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6549, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
